message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can call it a day!
You're not being generous, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, Bob. But don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're not budging, I see. I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this deal.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Let's make a deal before I get too old to care about this money!
You're trying to rush me, but I'm not in a hurry. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm getting desperate.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Bob. It's time to make a fair deal!
You're getting a bit more aggressive, Alice. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give in completely.
I'm not going to back down, Bob. It's time to meet me halfway!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Alice. I'm willing to take a smaller share to make this deal happen, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You've pushed me to my limit, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
